Name: Cranberry Delicious
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Cranberry juice given more interest with mint, lime and bitters. This drink contains trace amounts of alcohol but remains an effective driver's option.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2006 by Damian Windsor at Bin 8945 Wine Bar & Bistro, West Hollywood, USA.
